chinese: 追踪 n.痕迹
english: trace

chinese: 这只警犬循着气味找到了被偷走的钱款。
english: The police dog traced the scent and located the stolen money

chinese: n，差异；对照，对比区 （+with）使与⋯对比
english: contrast

chinese: 在国际象模里，黑白两棋的差异显而易见。
english: In chess, the contrast between black and white is easy to see

chinese: 实质上的 adj（计算机）虚拟的；十分接近的；
english: virtual

chinese: 只有在他戴上虚拟现实眼镜的时候，他的女朋友才会出现。
english: His girlfriend only appears when he wears the virtual reality glasses

chinese: n.格子
english: grid

chinese: 这个女孩在笔记本上画了格子。
english: The girl drew a grid in her notebook

chinese: n. 孤独
english: solitude

chinese: 子然一身的我唯有影子为伴。
english: I am in solitude, My shadow is my only friend

chinese: 1，鹦鹉
english: parrot

chinese: 有些鹦鹉可以像人一样说话。
english: Some parrots can talk just like a person

chinese: V. 打翻；推翻
english: overturn

chinese: 我十分生气，以至于我把甜筒冰激凌打翻了。
english: I was so angry that I overturned my ice cream cone

chinese: 加.严峻的考验，苦难的经历，折磨
english: ordeal

chinese: 走到迷宫中间对我来说一定是个严峻的考验。
english: It will be a big ordeal getting to the middle of the maze

chinese: n. 球杆 v.给•••提示
english: cue

chinese: 打台球时，你要用球杆去击球。
english: While playing billiards, you should hit the ball with a cue

chinese: ad.必不可少的，至关重要的；有活力
english: vital

chinese: 水对生物来说是必不可少的。
english: Water is vital to living beings

chinese: IL.使瘫痪；使麻痹；使不能活动
english: paralyze

chinese: 男孩瘫痪了但仍然对生活感到积极。
english: The boy is paralyzed but still feeling positive about life

chinese: m针；针状物；指针
english: needle

chinese: 你缝衣服所需要的就是针和线。
english: All you need to sew clothing is a needle and thread

chinese: wE. 保持，维持
english: maintain

chinese: 我每天都洗车来维持它的光洁如新。
english: I wash my car daily to maintain its shine

chinese: 1.身份；特性
english: identity

chinese: 他掏出身份证来表明自己是谁。
english: He took out his identity card to show who he was

chinese: 四 管理，控制
english: regulate

chinese: 这个人的职责是管理交通。
english: This guy's duty is to regulate the traffic

chinese: 国编年史，年代记，记录 以记录，把…⋯载入编年史
english: chronicle

chinese: 这部中国古代编年史记载了很多历史事件。
english: This ancient Chinese chronicle is a record of past events
